banner.title: New In
banner.description: Welcome to the 'New In' spot! Here’s where you’ll find the latest arrivals from top brands to freshen up your closet & living space or add glam to your get-up. Scroll down for everything new & trending.

banner.title: New season, new styles
banner.description: Get inspired to refresh your wardrobe for the season from our Spring/Summer 2022 collection. Swipe up to explore a wide range of your fave styles in a burst of pastels, floral patterns and bright colors.

banner.title: LET’S MAKE THINGS BETTER
banner.description: At Levi’s®, it’s about making better choices like sourcing more sustainable materials and finding ways to use less water. It’s about making better clothes like WellThread™, their most sustainably designed collection and bettering the planet and the communities that share it at every step along the way. They’ve always stood up for what’s right — and creating sustainable clothing is no different Explore the sustainable collection below

banner.title: Running shoes
banner.description: Explore now a new range of running shoes from Hoka, maximum cushion and minimal weight to boost your performance. Swipe up and shop now.

banner.title: Fresh Spring Hues
banner.description: Liven up your new season outfits with cheerful pastels, bold colorways and classic designs. Explore the latest collection of bags to have by your side always.

banner.title: Spring/Summer 2022
banner.description: Watch the flowers bloom with all new shoes and accessories that add a pop of color and a dash of adventure to any ensemble. Swipe up to step into new and for a much-needed seasonal refresh.

banner.title: Styles that rule the season
banner.description: From gem-embellished satin sandals to flora jacquard Mary Jane flats, this season’s shoe styles are undeniably must-haves. Even better? Pair them with a matching bag for a complete look. Swipe up to explore shoes and bags in vibrant floral prints

banner.title: Keep it Classic, Keep it Old Skool
banner.description: Worn by punk-rock legends and hip-hop royalty, Vans Old Skool kicks remain classics within the hearts of sneakerheads. They're cooler-than-cool streetwear staples that look good on everyone and instantly level-up any outfit. Explore the latest drops in exciting colorways and patterns.

banner.title: Wake up your workout
banner.description: Pumping iron is tough, but that doesn’t mean you can’t look cute while at it.  For an extra dose of energy, skip the protein shakes and opt for Nike’s tees, shorts, shoes & more for a boost of the good stuff (we’re talking advanced performance). Rania Elaina shows us how it’s done!

banner.title: The Only Way is Through
banner.description: Push past your limits and hit those goals with the latest collection from Under Armour. Gear up for the gym, a run or whatever your routine with performance wear that won’t let you down. Trust the process and scroll down to explore.
